descriptionlist.description: Tested on iOS 13 w/ Zebra v1.1.10 (however it should work on earleir versions)
descriptionlist.longdescription:
· StripeCount lets you see the number of installed packages at a glance (for the Zebra package manager)
· *There are no options to configure, it just works!
· Open source on github (https://github.com/UsrLightmann/StripeCount)
